title: SAMSUNG The Frame 2021 Series 138 cm (55 inch) QLED Ultra HD (4K) Smart TV  (QA55LS03AAKLXL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 LED TV, 1 Power Cord, 1 Remocon, 2 Stand-Top, 1 OC
product_specification.Other Video Features: Adaptive Picture, HDR 10+, Film Mode, Super Ultra Wide Game View
product_specification.Other Audio Features: Dolby Digital Plus, Spacefit Sound, Adaptive Sound, Q Symphony
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Apple TV, Zee5, Disney+ Hotstar, SonyLiv, Voot and many more
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Tap View connectivity, Screen Mirroring, Digital Audio Out
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Multi View, Bixby and Alexa Voice Assistant, Brightness and Motion Sensor, One Connect Box, Height Adjustable Stand
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Product Warranty and 1 Year Additional on Panel
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Customisable Bezel: With this Samsung television, you can set the ambience of your living room or bedroom according to your mood, season, or weather. The magnetic bezels of this home entertainment appliance are available in different colours and shapes to let you decorate your home the way you want.
product_description.Art Mode: You can transform your living room or bedroom into your own private art gallery using this Samsung The Frame TV.

review: It's really amazing choice...Thanks to samsung. I choose installation with samsung by help of customer care and it worked superb for me. This tv features are really amazing..the multi view, pc mode, ambient and art mode....many many more. If you have a proper hd content to watch..one of the best screens with 120 hz refresh.

TV is fairly nice. The 43 inch is a bit different from other sizes in few aspects. The major one being, you wont get the no gap wall mount. Instead there are 2 very small and sleek wall mounts. That made the whole installation process a big hassle. The Jeeves executive was also surprised to see that wall mount and it took him approx. 30-45 min. to mount the TV. However, once installed, TV looks flushed inside the wall. But still, Samsung could have provided a no gap wall mount with smaller sized TV.

In 43 inch, you wont get the 120hz or VRR. So, if you are looking for a TV for your new Xbox/PS, better go for 55inch or higher. If you have an older Xbox/PS, they work very nice with the help of game mode. Picture quality and sound is good. No complaints on that. Streaming Netflix/Amazon/YouTube is very nice. In some places, Black or dark scenesdoes not come out to be that nice. But it is bearable.

Its USP is the art mode. And it justifies it. It do looks like an art piece. You would only get limited no. of pieces. However, I am not able to access those free artworks even after signing into samsung account. Help me out in this. But, you can add your own photos through smart things app.

All in all, TV is very good, except for the installation process.

Art mode is a great feature and it's an add on for your leaving room..Very good display.. colors are really pop out and looks amazing. Intelligent mode works quite well. 40 watt sound is good enough. Tizen OS is very smooth and all the apps work well. Looks really great on the wall..
Internal storage is 6 GB and it's enough..

The tv was delivered to me within 2 days but the installation didn't happen for 5 days and i had to call flipkart and Samsung several times for the installation and then it happened, so i am really disappointed at that front. As for the tv, i found it ok, i was expecting a quality lile oled but that's my fault otherwise pics and videos are good vibrant but i highly suggest you invest in a decent soundbar.

Also the offer included a free magnetic bezel worth 9900/- but flipkart is very very reluctant to honor that offer, i called the flipkart support for almost a month and more than 10 calls and Finally it got delivered after almost one Month of buying the tv and that too after my constant call to them. So kindly look into it if you purchase this tv, as it does enhances the overall look of the tv and makes it look like an actual frame.

The Bazel frame given with the TV is not as expected one.

Very thin Bazel frame and it doesn't add the aesthetic look of TV.

It's required some more width, especially for 55 inch.
Picture quality is good as expected from a QLED.

One connect is a beautiful concept.

Voice control,solar recharge and universal control is a good features in beautiful Samsung remote.
There is a lag in remote controler

READ MORE

Superb tv .. Stunning to watch movies,series in 4K.
Suggest to have Home theatre for complete cinema experience.. well tv speaker quality also good if have a small living / bedroom.

Maybe not in the league of the best televisions in terms of picture quality but definitely the most stylish and eye catcher.

Rich in features.
Samsung TV plus is a hit or miss. Depends on individual choices.
Picture and sound quality is better if not the best.
Tizen Operating System is smooth and fluid.
Support for all major apps.
Additional bezels makes it truly stunning looking and sets it apart from the other tv's out there.

Worth the value in all and every aspect.
Go for it if you looking for a TV which sets itself in your living/drawing room and enhances the glamor of the area.

Special thanks to Flipkart firstly to deliver the tv in a day's time and also for their immense help and continuous support in acquiring the bezels. It was a task claiming the bezels as things were so unclear related to the offer but here I would like to add special mention to Mr. Abhishek from customer support team who really understood my issues and escalated the issue in manner such that I was able to get my hands on the included offer.

No Complaints at all what so ever with the product nor with the services of Flipkart.

After using 3 months of samsung frame tv, i would recommend you to buy this tv which gives you to reach maximum expectations like picture quality and function of this Television. Believe me it's a user friendly television which you can operate easily and it will gives you a cinematic experience , from my perspective it's a outstanding television.

Pros:
Cheapest tv in india with hdmi2.1 and 120htz refresh rate.
Good picture quality.
Excellent design.. TV is thin and one connect is an amazing technology.

Cons:
Remote has a response lag.
Tizen is has certain apps missing like jio tv and airtel xtreme

I didn’t really like the way the installation was done by the technician. I am giving 5 stars just because i really liked the Tv.

Amazing TV!

Pros:
- Display quality is awesome.
- Good upscaling of SD channels compared to other brands.
- Good brightness levels with no noticeable glare.
- Interface is very responsive. No lag
- Super thin display with an additional One Connect Box

Cons:
- Average sound quality with low volume levels
- No support for Jio TV and very few apps available compared to an Android TV

Note: Remote reception is on One Connect Box. So if you keep the box inside the cupboard or somewhere far, it will affect the responsiveness of the remote.

Samsung is the pioneer of QLED tech and their QLED panels are borrowed by all other TV manufacturers. But when you compare the picture quality Samsung TVs have the edge over other brands. Like everyone I did a lot of research and came to know that Samsung is way above TCL, Mi, IFalcon, Hisense and 1+. The only let down is the refresh rate given to 50 inch tele. 60hz refresh rate if absolutely fine but could have been amazing if it had 120hz refresh like 55 & 65 inch models. Brightness is easi...

Awesome product from Samsung. Great picture quality and sound is good. The art mode is simply super. Only issue I faced was that I had to follow-up multiple times with flipkart on the free bezel. Other than that I don't think I have any other issues from the past 3 months that I have been using it. It may be pricier than other QLED tvs but trust me, it's worth it.

The TV is amazing. All positives.
1. Good clarity
2. Good sound
3. Good OS
4. Easy connect over ARC
5. Nice standby wallpaper mode.

Only major hindrance: the wall mount.
1. It is included in the package but not mentioned.
2. Installation not performed by Samsung
3. Third party vendor was slow. Less communicative.
4. Third party vendor was slightly unaware of installation procedure. Here Samsung is to blame, due to their highly complex 2 piece wall mount which is difficult to balance. Install...

Tv is good picture quality is excellent and sound is also good I will suggest you to buy this tv .

The best QLED under 1 lakh in India.

Pros:

1. Excellent color reproduction (change default settings though)
2. 120 hz support, but the screen response time is like 11-12 ms so some ghosting is visible, but that's still better than 30 ms or above in most panels.
3. Sound is decent, although I have hooked it up to a JBL soundbar.
4. Frame functionality is very good. Recommend that you buy the free bezels that are available online.

Cons:
1. Artpieces are paid with the monthly plan that is quite steep.
2. Mounting it is a hassle with regular tv wall mounts.
3. Google assistant is a pain to set up and doesn't work half the time.
4. App selection is very limited compared to Android TV.
Best 43 inches tv available in the market if you have budget of 60k then blindly go for it awesome picture quality sound is also excellent the one connect box give’s awesome connectivity ports

The TV is good with the no gap wall mount pretty impressive. The display of the TV is also good but I think there are even better displays out there in the same price range.

The installation team is also worth a mention as he was very helpful and the service offered was awesome.

Sound system could have been better. Sound bar will be needed for some people. Software is smooth and super responsive. Have to explore other features.

Amazing TV. Stunning Looks. Head Turner. Great performance. More than expected. Loving every bit of it.

Purchased 43 inch which comes with a different wall mount tooks effort by the engineer as he was not aware about this new wall mount. He was about to install it on a old wall mount with big gap but i told him from the instruction booklet and thn he understood. Afterall it looks beautiful. So for all who are planning 43 inch go through the instruction booklets with tv.

Samsung Frame 2021 has been a treat. This Qled TV with the tech features of 100% colpur Volume , One connect box , space fit sound , Solar remote , Superb screen refresh rate - not only is decorated with best Tech specs but An Amazing feature of putting the TV like a Frame in your home , with chageable Bezels as well. This brings decor of your living room or Bedroom to life and I truly relish it.

This machine is the best Qled - in the pricing range offered in Market today.

-Very few Apps available in its app store.

//Consider Sony X80J before buying Frame TV//

Samsung The Frame TV has perfect colours/contrast and the blacks are also deep and accurate... 40 watt speakers are well balanced for optimal output... MEMC software needs little improvement and the Greys need little balancing but overall the TV has got amazing picture video quality....

This tv hardware is no doubt its one of the best but only con its operating system tizen os it's lacks in 3rd party apps u can't sideload any apps outside of it's app store which Is a big con compared to Sony or any Android TV...Samsung should adopt to Android TV or atleast give us options to hv Google play store or shld give us options to install apps out side of appstore of tizen os.

One of the major reason for buying this unit was it's aesthetics. While the unit is sleek and sits petty well to the wall but the picture art availability is a disappointment. After shelling out 75k we have got only 1 default option, for additional artworks one has to buy them from the app. Add to that, for additional frames, one has to shell out 6-7k .
Other than that, samsung delivers nicely in terms of conventional parameters - sound, display etc. Interface is also quite good and easy. Remote style is quite refreshing.
Although more options could have been provided for pre-loaded apps.
